movie_title: Food for new mums ⏲️ 6 Minute English
introduction: What do mothers eat after giving birth? Does it depend on which country you are from? Georgie and Be

vocabulary.definition: providing the food or other substances necessary for growth, health, and good condition
vocabulary.example: After giving birth, the new mum needed nourishing food to regain her strength.

vocabulary.definition: a protein that forms connective tissue and is found in skin, tendons, ligaments, etc.
vocabulary.example: The roast pig trotters were recommended for their high collagen content to help produce breast milk.

vocabulary.definition: people who can cope with several things at the same time
vocabulary.example: New mums often feel like expert jugglers, managing a new baby and their own recovery.

vocabulary.definition: relating to or denoting a verb plus one or more adverbs or prepositions used as an idiomatic expression
vocabulary.example: The phrasal verb 'fall apart' means to become emotionally disturbed beyond the ability to cope.

vocabulary.definition: becoming popular or the subject of many posts on social media within a short period of time
vocabulary.example: Stay tuned for more trending topics in our upcoming episodes.

vocabulary.definition: a summary of what has been said or done
vocabulary.example: Let's do a quick recap of the key vocabulary we've covered in this program.
